product_title: Vaseline Intensive Care, Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Lotion, for Radiant, Glowing Skin, with Glycerin, Non-Sticky, Fast Absorbing, Daily Moisturizer for Dry, Rough Skin, For Men & Women - 400ml

detail.name: Vaseline Intensive Care, Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Lotion, for Radiant, Glowing Skin, with Glycerin, Non-Sticky, Fast Absorbing, Daily Moisturizer for Dry, Rough Skin, For Men & Women - 400ml

details.description_text: BrandVaselineScentUnscented Item FormLotionActive IngredientsGlycerin and Vaseline JellyNet Quantity400.0 millilitreNumber of Items1Use forWhole BodySkin TypeAllSpecial IngredientsGlycerinMaterial Type FreeChemical FreeLIGHT AND NON-STICKY: The Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Body Lotion, with its special double-action formula is effortlessly absorbed into the skin. It makes an ideal dry skin moisturizer.HYDRATING SKIN MOISTURISER: This body lotion contains glycerine and oat extracts that hydrate the skin quickly while also nourishing and maintaining the skin barrier. The Vaseline Jelly replenishes and locks in the moisture of the skin, leaving it soft and healthy, making it a perfect skin lotion.SUITABLE FOR ROUGH AND DRY SKIN: This unisex moisturising lotion is suitable for normal, dry and even rough skin. It is also designed to withstand harsh climatic conditions and is therefore ideal for daily use.DEEP MOISTURE AND NOURISHMENT: The clinically tested body lotion for women and men can penetrate 5 layers deep into the epidermis and provide moisture for up to 48 hours. It absorbs quickly, so you can get dressed within minutes of application.EASY TO USE PACKAGING: The Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Lotion (400 ml) has a smart pump quick-lock technology that unlocks and locks with ease without creating any mess, making it super convenient to use.HOW TO USE: For optimum results, it is recommended to use the Vaseline Deep Moisture Body Lotion twice a day, apply the Vaseline Lotion generously on the skin, and massage till it gets absorbed.

product_title: YC Whitening Diamond Body Lotion - 205ml (Thailand)

detail.name: YC Whitening Diamond Body Lotion - 205ml (Thailand)

details.description_text: YC Whitening Diamond Lotion is designed to enhance skin brightness, providing deep moisturization while helping to reduce the appearance of dark spots and uneven skin tone. It contains a unique combination of brightening agents and diamond powder to gently exfoliate and reveal a more radiant, even-toned complexion. Key Benefits: Skin Whitening: Aids in lightening dark spots, pigmentation, and blemishes, giving your skin a brighter and more even tone over time. Exfoliating Properties: The diamond powder gently exfoliates the skin, removing dead skin cells to reveal smoother, glowing skin. Deep Hydration: Nourishes and moisturizes the skin, preventing dryness and keeping it soft and supple. Improves Skin Texture: Regular use can enhance skin smoothness and reduce roughness. Aloe suppresses bacterial activity, eliminates pathogenic manifestations and stimulates tissue regeneration. detail.name: SKINO ULTIMATE GLOW VITAMIN E NOURISHING BODY LOTION 200ML

details.description_text: Product details of SKINO ULTIMATE GLOW VITAMIN E NOURISHING BODY LOTION 200MLUltimate Glow Vitamin E Body Lotion is formulated to moisturize and nourish your skin deeply. Infused with the powerful antioxidant Vitamin E, this lotion helps to repair and strengthen the skin barrier and promotes a radiant, healthy glow. Its non-greasy formula makes it perfect for daily use and suitable for all skin types.

product_title: Bioxin Novaclear Whitening Body Lotion 150ml

detail.name: Bioxin Novaclear Whitening Body Lotion 150ml

details.description_text: The Key to Radiant, Even-Toned SkinThe Whitening Body Lotion with Glycolic Acid is a multi-functional skincare product designed to improve the appearance of skin discoloration, correct hyperpigmentation, and keep your skin in good condition.Active ingredients :Alpha Arbutin Glycolic acid & Vitamin C Volume: 150ml/5.07 fl ozBenefit1.Helps exfoliate the dead epidermis. 2.Lighten and brighten the skin. 3.Protection against Oxidative Stress. 4.Slows Down Photoaging. 5.Fragrance-FreeIt contains Glycolic Acid, which exfoliates dead .skin cells, allowing better absorption of its whitening ingredients, including Alpha Arbutin and Vitamin C. The stable form of Vitamin C also protects the skin from oxidative stress and slows down the aging caused by sun exposure.HOW TO USE: Apply daily on cleansed skin or as directed by a dermatologist.

product_title: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa glow Body Lotion For Men & Women - 400ml (Indian)

detail.name: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa glow Body Lotion For Men & Women - 400ml (Indian)

details.description_text: Products type : Body lotion Capacity : 400 ml Used for male/female Suitable for all types of skin Deep hydration: The lotion contains a blend of nourishing ingredients like cocoa butter, vitamin E, and glycerin that work together to provide intense hydration and keep the skin feeling soft and supple. Long-lasting moisture: The lotion provides up to 24 hours of moisture, helping to prevent dryness and flakiness and leaving the skin feeling smooth and hydrated all day long. Fast-absorbing formula: The lightweight, non-greasy formula of the lotion absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving any residue behind, making it ideal for daily use. Skin-nourishing properties: The lotion contains cocoa butter, which is a natural emollient that helps to soften and soothe the skin, and vitamin E, which is a powerful antioxidant that helps to protect the skin from environmental damage. Improves skin texture: With regular use, Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Glow Body Lotion helps to improve the skin's elasticity and overall texture, leaving it looking and feeling healthy and radiant. Suitable for all skin types: The lotion is gentle and suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Made in Indian

product_title: Vaseline Deep Moisture 48 HR Serum In Lotion For Dry Skin Body For Men & Women - 400ml (Indian)

detail.name: Vaseline Deep Moisture 48 HR Serum In Lotion For Dry Skin Body For Men & Women - 400ml (Indian)

details.description_text: Introducing the Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Lotion in a generous 600ml bottle, a luxurious blend designed to replenish dry and rough skin with unparalleled comfort and hydration. Crafted with care, this ultra-light lotion is a true skincare staple suitable for both men and women, seamlessly integrating into your daily skincare routine.Enriched with a potent double-action formula featuring glycerine and Vaseline jelly, this moisturizer works tirelessly to restore your skin's lost moisture, leaving it velvety soft and supple. Its deep moisturizing properties and fast-absorbing formula shield your skin from the harsh elements of changing seasons, ensuring it remains radiant and timeless throughout the day.Experience the top benefits of this nourishing lotion, including 48 hours of continuous moisture, relief for dry and rough skin, a non-greasy feel, and its ability to penetrate all five layers of the epidermis. Formulated without harmful chemicals and free from any overpowering scents, it provides a truly indulgent skincare experience.Key ingredients like glycerin, Vaseline jelly, oats extract, and hyaluronic acid work synergistically to deliver optimal results, leaving your skin feeling rejuvenated and revitalized with every use.For best results, incorporate this lotion into your daily regimen by applying it generously and massaging until fully absorbed. Vaseline, with its rich heritage dating back to 1870, remains committed to promoting skin health for people of all skin types and backgrounds. With Vaseline, you can embrace life without constraints, confident in your skin's health and vitality.Made in Indian

secured payment gateway.DescriptionDescriptionVelvet Uv Whitening Pomegranate Face And Body Lotion 400mlThe Velvet UV Whitening Pomegranate Face and Body Lotion is a nourishing skincare solution enriched with the antioxidant power of pomegranate extract. This lotion provides intense hydration while brightening your skin for a radiant and even tone. With advanced UV protection, it shields your skin from harmful sun damage, preventing dark spots and premature aging. Designed for both face and body, its lightweight formula ensures easy absorption and a non-greasy finish, making it perfect for daily use.Features and BenefitsWhitening and Brightening: Contains pomegranate extract and other active ingredients that help lighten the skin and enhance its natural glow.UV Protection: Equipped with UVA and UVB filters to protect against sun damage.Rich in Antioxidants: Pomegranate extract is packed with antioxidants that repair and rejuvenate the skin.Dual Action: Suitable for use on both face and body, providing complete skincare in one product.Non-Greasy Formula: Lightweight texture absorbs quickly, leaving the skin smooth and fresh.Long-Lasting Hydration: Locks in moisture for soft, supple skin throughout the day.Anti-Aging Benefits: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by protecting against environmental stressors.Key IngredientsPomegranate Extract: Brightens the skin, reduces pigmentation, and provides antioxidant benefits.Vitamin C: Enhances skin radiance and protects against free radicals.UV Filters: Protects the skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays.Aloe Vera Extract: Soothes and hydrates the skin, reducing dryness and irritation.Glycerin: Retains skin moisture and promotes a smooth, healthy texture.How to UseCleanse: Start with clean, dry skin.Apply: Take an appropriate amount of lotion and spread evenly over your face and body.Massage: Gently massage in a circular motion until fully absorbed.Reapply: For best results, reapply after sun exposure or as needed throughout the day.FAQsIs this lotion suitable for oily skin?Yes, the lightweight and non-greasy formula makes it ideal for all skin types, including oily skin.Can I use this lotion as a sunscreen?While it provides UV protection, it's recommended to use additional sunscreen for prolonged sun exposure.Does it contain any harmful chemicals?No, it is formulated with skin-friendly ingredients and is free from harsh chemicals.How often should I use this lotion?For best results, use daily after bathing and reapply as needed for continued hydration and UV protection.

enriched with the antioxidant power of pomegranate extract. This lotion provides intense hydration while brightening your skin for a radiant and even tone. With advanced UV protection, it shields your skin from harmful sun damage, preventing dark spots and premature aging. Designed for both face and body, its lightweight formula ensures easy absorption and a non-greasy finish, making it perfect for daily use.Features and BenefitsWhitening and Brightening: Contains pomegranate extract and other active ingredients that help lighten the skin and enhance its natural glow.UV Protection: Equipped with UVA and UVB filters to protect against sun damage.Rich in Antioxidants: Pomegranate extract is packed with antioxidants that repair and rejuvenate the skin.Dual Action: Suitable for use on both face and body, providing complete skincare in one product.Non-Greasy Formula: Lightweight texture absorbs quickly, leaving the skin smooth and fresh.Long-Lasting Hydration: Locks in moisture for soft, supple skin throughout the day.Anti-Aging Benefits: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by protecting against environmental stressors.Key IngredientsPomegranate Extract: Brightens the skin, reduces pigmentation, and provides antioxidant benefits.Vitamin C: Enhances skin radiance and protects against free radicals.UV Filters: Protects the skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays.Aloe Vera Extract: Soothes and hydrates the skin, reducing dryness and irritation.Glycerin: Retains skin moisture and promotes a smooth, healthy texture.How to UseCleanse: Start with clean, dry skin.Apply: Take an appropriate amount of lotion and spread evenly over your face and body.Massage: Gently massage in a circular motion until fully absorbed.Reapply: For best results, reapply after sun exposure or as needed throughout the day.FAQsIs this lotion suitable for oily skin?Yes, the lightweight and non-greasy formula makes it ideal for all skin types, including oily skin.Can I use this lotion as a sunscreen?While it provides details.description_text: à¦®à¦¾à¦¥à¦¾ à¦¥à§à¦à§ à¦ªà¦¾ à¦ªà¦°à§à¦¯à¦¨à§à¦¤ 3/4 à¦¶à§à¦¡ à¦«*à¦°à§à¦¸à¦¾ à¦à¦°à¦¬à§à¥¤ à¦¹à¦¾à¦¤, à¦ªà¦¾ à¦à¦à§à¦à§à¦¬à¦² à¦à¦°à¦¬à§à¥¤ à¦¸à¦¾à¦¨à¦à§à¦¯à¦¾à¦¨, à¦¡à¦¾à¦°à§à¦ à¦¸à§à¦ªà¦ à¦°à¦¿à¦¡à¦¿à¦à¦¸ à¦à¦°à¦¬à§à¥¤ à¦¸à§à¦à¦¿à¦¨à§à¦° à¦¡à§*à¦¡ à¦¸à§à¦²à¦¸ à¦°à¦¿à¦®à§à¦­ à¦à¦°à¦¬à§à¥¤ à¦à§à¦¨à§ à¦ªà§à¦°à¦à¦¾à¦° à¦¸à¦¾à¦à¦¡ à¦à¦«à§à¦à§à¦à¦¸ à¦¨à§à¦à¥¤ à¦¸à§à¦à¦¿à¦¨à¦à§ à¦à¦¾à¦¨à¦à¦¾à¦¨, à¦¸à¦«à¦ à¦ à¦¸à§à¦®à§à¦¥ à¦°à¦¾à¦à¦¬à§à¥¤ Unlock the secret to radiant skin with Kem Cot Thai Whitening Body Cream, your ultimate solution for a luminous complexion. Formulated with powerful natural ingredients, this luxurious cream not only brightens your skin but also deeply nourishes and hydrates, leaving you with a silky-smooth finish. Imagine stepping out with confidence, knowing that your skin looks flawless and feels rejuvenated.Infused with herbal extracts and vitamins, Kem Cot Thai Whitening Body Cream works diligently to reduce dark spots and even out skin tone, giving you a brighter, more youthful appearance. The lightweight texture absorbs quickly, making it perfect for daily use without any greasy residue. Youâll love how it enhances your skinâs natural glow while providing essential moisture that lasts throughout the day.Experience the transformative power of Kem Cot Thai Whitening Body Cream as it revitalizes your skin from within. With regular application, youâll notice a significant improvement in radiance and softness, making it an essential part of your beauty routine. Embrace the beauty of luminous skin and let Kem Cot be your partner in achieving that coveted glow!Brand Name: KEM COT THAI Volume: 250g Brand Origin: Vietnam Skin Type: All Skin Types Body Area: Full Body Type: Daily Use Main Purpose: Anti-bacterial, Lifting, Sun protection, Whitening, Moisturizing Period After Opening (PAO): 12M Formulation: CreamKem Cot Thai Key Features:Brightening Effect: Designed to lighten dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone.Hydration: Usually contains moisturizing ingredients to keep the skin hydrated and smooth.Skin Tone Improvement: Aims to provide a more even and radiant complexion.Common Ingredients:Whitening Agents: May include ingredients like vitamin C, kojic acid, or arbutin, which are known for their skin-lightening properties.Moisturizers: Such as shea butter or glycerin, which help to keep the skin soft and hydrated.Antioxidants: Ingredients like vitamin E may be included for their skin-nourishing and protective benefits.Kem Cot Thai Body Cream Benefits:Skin Lightening: Helps to reduce the appearance of dark spots and even out skin tone.Moisturizing: Keeps the skin hydrated, which can enhance the skinâs overall appearance and texture.Radiance: Aims to give the skin a brighter, more youthful glow.How to use:Clean and Dry: Ensure your skin is clean and dry before application. Apply: Take a sufficient amount of cream and apply it evenly to the body. Massage: Gently massage the cream into the skin until fully absorbed. Frequency: Use as directed, typically once or twice a day.Notes:Patch Test: Conduct a patch test on a small area of skin before full application to check for any adverse reactions or sensitivities. Sun Protection: Consider using sunscreen in conjunction with the cream to protect your skin from UV damage, which can affect the results. Consultation: If you have sensitive skin, or if you experience any irritation or allergic reactions, discontinue use and consult a dermatologist.
